SELECT
pq.no no, pro_name pro_name, pro_qna_title title, pro_qna_type_name qna_type, pro_qna_date day, qna_type_name status FROM
product pro, pro_qna pq, pro_qna_type tc, qna_status qs, member m WHERE pro.no=pq.pro_no
and pq.pro_qna_type_code = tc.pro_qna_type_code and qs.qna_status_code = pq.qna_Status_code and m.no= pq.member_no
and member_no=#{member_no}
and pq.pro_qna_type_code='${searchColumn}'

select q.no no, pro_name pro_name, pro_qna_type_name qna_type, pro_qna_title title, nickname nickname, pro_qna_date day , qna_type_name status from pro_qna q, pro_qna_type t, qna_status s,product p,member m where q.pro_qna_type_code = t.pro_qna_type_code and q.qna_status_code = s.qna_status_code and p.no=q.pro_no and m.no=q.member_no

select q.no no, pro_name pro_name, pro_qna_type_name qna_type, pro_qna_title title, nickname nickname, pro_qna_date day, qna_type_name status, pro_qna_content content, p.no pro_no from pro_qna q, pro_qna_type t, qna_status s,product p,member m where q.pro_qna_type_code = t.pro_qna_type_code and q.qna_status_code = s.qna_status_code and p.no=q.pro_no and m.no=q.member_no and q.no=#{no}

select p.no no, pro_name, pro_qna_type_name qna_type, pro_qna_title title, pro_qna_content content, name nickname, pro_qna_date day, qna_type_name status from (select rownum num,q.no,pro_name,pro_qna_type_name,pro_qna_title,pro_qna_content,name, pro_qna_date,qna_type_name from pro_qna q, pro_qna_type t, qna_status s,product p,member m where q.pro_qna_type_code = t.pro_qna_type_code and q.qna_status_code = s.qna_status_code and p.no=q.pro_no and m.no=q.member_no
and q.pro_qna_type_code='${searchColumn}'
) p
where pro_qna_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR pro_qna_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select count(*) from pro_qna
where pro_qna_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or pro_qna_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
